lead_paragraph: Less than six months after resigning as chief executive of the WTA Tour, Stacy Allaster is joining the United States Tennis Association as its chief executive for professional tennis.

headline.print_headline: Rejuvenated, Former WTA Leader Returns to the Game, With the U.S.T.A.
headline.main: Stacey Allaster, Former WTA Leader, Returns to the Game, With the U.S.T.A.

snippet: Less than six months after resigning as chief executive of the WTA Tour, Stacy Allaster is joining the United States Tennis Association as its chief executive for professional tennis.
abstract: United States Tennis Assn announces Stacey Allaster will assume new position of chief executive for professional tennis, almost six months after she unexpectedly resigned as chief executive of WTA Tour.
